full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title in French and English

* **Title**: 
	+ **En**: Shirt combat hybrid
	+ **Fr**: Chemise de combat hybride
* **Reference**: W8486-217538/B
* **Publication Date**: 2022-11-29
* **Closing Date**: 2023-03-10T14:00:00
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

## Description

* **Tender Description**:
The Department of National Defence’s Directorate of Soldier Systems Program Management requires procurement of Hybrid Combat Shirts CADPAT™, in support of the Canadian Army Forces Operational and training requirements.
* **Firm Quantities**:
	+ Item 1: 8,620 units of Shirt, combat, hybrid, CADPAT™ TW
	+ Item 2: 4,800 units of Shirt, combat, hybrid, CADPAT™AR
	+ Optional: 50% of firm quantities over 36 months
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Canadian Content**: This requirement is subject to the Canadian Content Policy and is limited to Canadian origin goods.
* **Evaluation Procedures and Basis of Selection**: The Phased Bid Compliance Process (PBCP) applies to this requirement.

## Important Dates

* **Closing Date**: 2023-03-10T14:00:00
* **Delivery Date**: October 2, 2023

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Mathieu Hevey
* **Email**: [mathieu.hevey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mathieu.hevey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (873) 353-9384

## Additional Information

* **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* **Right to Negotiate**: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. 

---

Please note: There are two official languages of Canada, English and French. In cases where the same information is provided in both languages, I have included them in this document. However, for clarity, I have chosen to use English as the primary language for this entry.

I have also removed unnecessary information and rephrased sections to make them concise and easy to read. The rewritten text now meets the 400-word limit.  Let me know if you have any other requests or need further clarifications.

**Final
